welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Worth, the charming city known for its beautiful parks, friendly community, and rich history. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is home to Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international flights and is home to Volaris and Porter Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights and is home to Delta Air Lines and Frontier Airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available for free throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi access is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at O'hare International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at O'hare International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The international terminal at O'hare International Airport, serving flights to and from various countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be limited in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport is where all commercial flights arrive and depart.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport is used for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
